section.title: Pre-requisites
section.para: The file: mind-visual-diff*.jar is required in the ext sub-directory of the Mind C compiler directory.

section.title: The mind-diff command
section.para: The mind-diff command has the 3 possible following syntaxes : mind-diff --base-src-path=path list --head-src-path=path list OPTIONS definition
Compares definition component between --base-src-path and --head-src-path versions.
Compares baseDefinition component of --base-src-path to headDdefinition component of --head-src-path.
Compares baseDefinition component to headDdefinition component of --src-path.

Available options are :
--flatten
Enable architecture tree flattening (remove composite levels).
[--out-path|-o]=path
Set the directory where generated files are put (default is '.').
[--help|-h]
Print help message and exit.
[--version|-v]
Print version number and exit.

section.title: &productName; output
section.para: The output of the mind-diff command is a set of .gv files similar to the output of the graph target of a Mind project Makefile, with color conventions:
The entry point for the comparison is the TopLevel.gv file.
The .gv files are visualized using the mindot-viewer command.

section.title: Definition of a change
section.para: An instance is marked as changed if the instance in both source path repository has the same name but different type names.
